name: Journey Away (Sipihr)
description:
This game is copied from Flappy Bird. It was one of my initial projects when I started to game development. 

In this project I have aimed to draw pixel art, understand the basic concepts of game development. It is not perfect as it has problems on optimisation, animations and colour theory.

Game Developer/Artist : Furkan Vatansever.

Sounds are taken from github/flappy-bird-assets.

Note: This game may have updates when I have time to work on it.
